title: S12 Ep179: Armed and Dangerous: From Satan's Servant to a Savior
itunes:title: Armed and Dangerous: From Satan's Servant to a Savior
description:
John Ramirez spent his early years into adulthood studying Santeria and being groomed to be and eventually becoming a Satanic priest! After trying to make a spiritual break from his church, he was taken to Hell by Jesus Christ, Himself, and converted to Christianity. John Joins Beyond The Darkness to tell his story and let you know how you can protect yourselves from the forces of evil!

John Ramirez: http://bakerpublishinggroup.com/books/armed-and-dangerous/385430

PLUS: A brand new Theater of the Mind with a story involving... the Bloody Bones Man!!!
